data.text: @HerUniverse @enews I personally like the idea that he died. Honestly the scene at the end is more powerful when you realize he gave up his life to save the team, but at the same time his child was born of his sacrifice.
@HerUniverse @enews I think it is a clone groot
@mayusteapot @HerUniverse @enews I was about to say the same thing! Plant reproduction is weird... but yeah in this case it would be a clone.
@HerUniverse @enews Isn't he basically a clone? If you take a cutting and grow a tree from it, it's a clone. Or what happened in GotGVol1? I forget.
